content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
--------------------
No new structures have been successfully built on the map. Multiple recovery updates attempted to supply a Lab facility at (0.5, 2.5) for research support, but all placement and crafting attempts failed due to inventory shortages and unmet sub-ingredient dependencies. No other production structures have been created by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
----------
• API Usage – get_entities Issues
  - When retrieving entities, use the correct function signature. Avoid passing unsupported keyword arguments (for example, do not use 'radius') and ensure the proper number of positional parameters is given.
  
• Lab Placement and Retrieval
  - Verify that the Lab is present in the inventory before attempting placement. Prevent placement errors by checking both inventory and positional availability.
  
• Iteration over None
  - Before iterating over a collection of entities (such as labs), confirm that the returned value is not None.
  
• Lab Crafting Dependencies
  - Ensure that all sub-ingredients for Lab crafting (e.g. iron-gear-wheels and electronic-circuits) are available. Verify that prerequisite production steps—such as smelting and intermediate crafting (copper-cable, copper-plate, and related components)—have been successfully completed before reattempting Lab production.
